channel.title: [Request/Help]Require Assistance on Item to Object
channel.description: [size=12pt]Alright, i'm probably going to get flamed or bad mouthed...but here is the deal. I require assistance in adding a prayer altar which upon using bones[any bones] on them, you get experience. In simple terms, I want to use bones on a prayer altar to make people get more experience then in regular bone burying. Yes, I also want the bones to disappear upon this action. I know this is item to object and I have found tutorials. However, they fail to explain the public void/methods required along with many other things. If someone can please [b]POST THE CODE[/b] this, I would truly be greatful. Please and thank you. [/size]

item.title: [Request/Help]Require Assistance on Item to Object
item.dc:creator: @zerorecreation zerorecreation
item.description:
@zerorecreation wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:376197”]Add this to your item On Object packet (Assuming your using delta)

if(UsedOnObjectID == 10638){ if(ItemID == 526){ deleteItem(526, 1); addSkillXP(40*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); setAnimation(894); lowGFX(247,0); } if(ItemID == 532){ deleteItem(532, 1); addSkillXP(80*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); setAnimation(894); lowGFX(247,0); } if(ItemID == 536){ deleteItem(536, 1); addSkillXP(160*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); setAnimation(894); lowGFX(247,0); } TurnPlayerTo(UsedOnX, UsedOnY); }

^^ This code will work; But it is very large, and can easily be shortened.[/quote]

Thanks for the help but I am using blurrs client. I guess because you gave me the code, i can add the packet and yeah. Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: [Request/Help]Require Assistance on Item to Object
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Add this to your item On Object packet (Assuming your using delta)

if(UsedOnObjectID == 10638){ if(ItemID == 526){ deleteItem(526, 1); addSkillXP(40*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); setAnimation(894); lowGFX(247,0); } if(ItemID == 532){ deleteItem(532, 1); addSkillXP(80*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); setAnimation(894); lowGFX(247,0); } if(ItemID == 536){ deleteItem(536, 1); addSkillXP(160*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); setAnimation(894); lowGFX(247,0); } TurnPlayerTo(UsedOnX, UsedOnY); }

^^ This code will work; But it is very large, and can easily be shortened.

Read full topic
